#summary Voxeo's Tropo API gives us the tools we need to supply the voice interface for Moveable Weather.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

The Tropo Web API is a JSON interface to Voxeo's voice features. In recent months, libraries in various languages have been added, as a layer that sits above the JSON. Among these is the [http://github.com/tropo/tropo-webapi-python/blob/master//README Tropo Web API for Python], and this is what we use in the implementation of Moveable Weather.
